title: The Snowman
creator_credit: Dianne Jackson, John Coates and Snowman Enterprises
brief_description: A young boy dreams that his snowman comes to life. Together they share the perils and joys of winter. This animated film uses muted pastels coupled with an exquisite orchestral score to make this non-verbal Christmas tale an experience for all seasons. Based on the book by Raymond Briggs.
